mapper.select: select count(1) as cnt from ( select entry_no from ( select entry_no, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY entry_no ORDER BY serial DESC) AS serialRownum FROM ENTRY_HA_TEMP where entry_no = #{entryNo} and state != '0') where serialRownum = 1)

1 order by add_date asc, upd_date asc

SELECT
FROM ( SELECT
,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY entry_no ORDER BY serial DESC) AS serialRownum FROM ENTRY_HA_TEMP
) T1
ORDER BY upd_date DESC, shiki_date DESC, entry_no

pattern_cd, del_flg, add_date, upd_date
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(entry_no) FROM ( SELECT ENTRY_HA_TEMP.entry_no ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY ENTRY_HA_TEMP.entry_no ORDER BY serial DESC) AS serialRownum FROM ENTRY_HA_TEMP LEFT JOIN (SELECT MAX(response_day) as response_day, ENTRY_NO FROM FILE_ID INNER JOIN FILE_INFO ON (FILE_ID.FILE_ID = FILE_INFO.FILE_ID) GROUP BY ENTRY_NO ) TF ON (TF.ENTRY_NO = ENTRY_HA_TEMP.ENTRY_NO)
) T1 WHERE serialRownum = 1

SELECT rownum as no, entry_no as entryNo, policy as policy, name_keiyaku as contractorName, shiki_date as startDate, check_date as reviewRequestDate, response_day as correctionResponseDate, tate_keitai as buildingFrom, shozai as buildingLocation, payment_type as paymentType, katen_cd as salesCode, katen_name as salesName, dairi_cd as agentCode, dairi_name as agentName, shichiken_umu as withPledge, tate_kozo as buildingStructure, kozo_tekkotsu as steelBuildingType, kozo_other as otherBuildingType, kakunin_shorui as confirmEarthquakeDiscount, gekihen_kanwa as severeAlleviationMasure FROM ( SELECT ENTRY_HA_TEMP.* ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY ENTRY_HA_TEMP.entry_no ORDER BY serial DESC) AS serialRownum ,response_day as response_day FROM ENTRY_HA_TEMP LEFT JOIN (SELECT MAX(response_day) as response_day, ENTRY_NO FROM FILE_ID INNER JOIN FILE_INFO ON (FILE_ID.FILE_ID = FILE_INFO.FILE_ID) GROUP BY ENTRY_NO ) TF ON (TF.ENTRY_NO = ENTRY_HA_TEMP.ENTRY_NO)
) T1 WHERE serialRownum = 1 ORDER BY entry_no DESC, add_date DESC OFFSET (#{pageNo}-1)*#{recCount} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{recCount} ROWS ONLY
